verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֨ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> And thou son אָדָ֜ם <WH120> of man קַח־ <WH3947> take לְךָ֣ ׀ חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> knife חַדָּ֗ה <WH2299> thee a sharp תַּ֤עַר <WH8593> razor הַגַּלָּבִים֙ <WH1532> thee a barber's תִּקָּחֶ֣נָּה <WH3947> take לָּ֔ךְ וְהַעֲבַרְתָּ֥ <WH5674> and cause [it] to pass עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשְׁךָ֖ <WH7218> upon thine head וְעַל־ <WH5921> and זְקָנֶ֑ךָ <WH2206> and upon thy beard וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> then take לְךָ֛ מֹאזְנֵ֥י <WH3976> thee balances מִשְׁקָ֖ל <WH4948> to weigh וְחִלַּקְתָּֽם׃ <WH2505> and divide

שְׁלִשִׁ֗ית <WH7992> a third part בָּא֤וּר <WH217> with fire תַּבְעִיר֙ <WH1197> Thou shalt burn בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city כִּמְלֹ֖את <WH4390> are fulfilled יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> when the days הַמָּצ֑וֹר <WH4692> of the siege וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> and thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֗ית <WH7992> a third part תַּכֶּ֤ה <WH5221> [and] smite בַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> it with a knife סְבִ֣יבוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH5439> about וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <WH7992> and a third part תִּזְרֶ֣ה <WH2219> thou shalt scatter לָר֔וּחַ <WH7307> in the wind וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> a sword אָרִ֥יק <WH7324> and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> after

וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <WH3947> Thou shalt also take מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> also מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> thereof a few בְּמִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> in number וְצַרְתָּ֥ <WH6696> and bind אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בִּכְנָפֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3671> them in thy skirts

וּמֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> like ע֣וֹד <WH5750> again תִּקָּ֔ח <WH3947> Then take of them again וְהִשְׁלַכְתָּ֤ <WH7993> and cast אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into תּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> them into the midst הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> of the fire וְשָׂרַפְתָּ֥ <WH8313> and burn אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> them in the fire מִמֶּ֥נּוּ <WH4480> some תֵצֵא־ <WH3318> come forth אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> [for] thereof shall a fire אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> into all the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD זֹ֚את <WH2063> likewise יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> This [is] Jerusalem בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> it in the midst הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the nations שַׂמְתִּ֑יהָ <WH7760> I have set וּסְבִיבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH5439> [that are] round about אֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> and countries

וַתֶּ֨מֶר <WH4784> And she hath changed אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֤י <WH4941> my judgments לְרִשְׁעָה֙ <WH7564> into wickedness מִן־ <WH4480> more הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> more than the nations וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH853> חֻקּוֹתַ֔י <WH2708> and my statutes מִן־ <WH4480> than הָאֲרָצ֖וֹת <WH776> more than the countries אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which סְבִיבוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH5439> that [are] round about כִּ֤י <WH3588> for בְמִשְׁפָּטַי֙ <WH4941> my judgments מָאָ֔סוּ <WH3988> her for they have refused וְחֻקּוֹתַ֖י <WH2708> and my statutes לֹא־ <WH3808> not הָלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> they have not walked בָהֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3068> GOD יַ֤עַן <WH3282> Because הֲמָנְכֶם֙ <WH1995> Because ye multiplied מִן־ <WH4480> have more הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> more than the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which סְבִיבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5439> that [are] round about בְּחֻקּוֹתַי֙ <WH2708> in my statutes לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor הֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <WH1980> you [and] have not walked וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> my judgments לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <WH6213> neither have kept וּֽכְמִשְׁפְּטֵ֧י <WH4941> according to the judgments הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <WH1471> of the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5439> that [are] round about לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <WH6213> neither have done ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> I am against גַּם־ <WH1571> even אָ֑נִי <WH589> I וְעָשִׂ֧יתִי <WH6213> Behold I even I [am] against thee and will execute בְתוֹכֵ֛ךְ <WH8432> in the midst מִשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <WH4941> judgments לְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> of thee in the sight הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of the nations

וְעָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> And I will do בָ֗ךְ אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will never עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> in thee that which I have not done וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> of which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will never אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> and whereunto I will not do כָמֹ֖הוּ <WH3644> and the like ע֑וֹד <WH5750> again יַ֖עַן <WH3282> any more the like because כָּל־ <WH3605> of all תּוֹעֲבֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH8441> of all thine abominations ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore אָב֞וֹת <WH1> Therefore the fathers יֹאכְל֤וּ <WH398> shall eat בָנִים֙ <WH1121> the sons בְּתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <WH8432> in the midst וּבָנִ֖ים <WH1121> of thee and the sons יֹאכְל֣וּ <WH398> shall eat אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> their fathers וְעָשִׂ֤יתִי <WH6213> and I will execute בָךְ֙ שְׁפָטִ֔ים <WH8201> judgments וְזֵרִיתִ֥י <WH2219> of thee will I scatter אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׁאֵרִיתֵ֖ךְ <WH7611> in thee and the whole remnant לְכָל־ <WH3605> to every רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> into all the winds פ

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> So חַי־ <WH2416> Wherefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם֮ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֗א <WH3808> no יַ֚עַן <WH3282> because אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְדָּשִׁ֣י <WH4720> my sanctuary טִמֵּ֔את <WH2930> Surely because thou hast defiled בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all שִׁקּוּצַ֖יִךְ <WH8251> with all thy detestable things וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all תּוֹעֲבֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH8441> and with all thine abominations וְגַם־ <WH1571> will also אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I אֶגְרַע֙ <WH1639> therefore will I also diminish וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no תָח֣וֹס <WH2347> spare עֵינִ֔י <WH5869> [thee] neither shall mine eye וְגַם־ <WH1571> will also אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I לֹ֥א <WH3808> no אֶחְמֽוֹל׃ <WH2550> neither will I have any pity

שְׁלִשִׁתֵ֞יךְ <WH7992> A third part בַּדֶּ֣בֶר <WH1698> with the pestilence יָמ֗וּתוּ <WH4191> of thee shall die וּבָֽרָעָב֙ <WH7458> and with famine יִכְל֣וּ <WH3615> shall they be consumed בְתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <WH8432> in the midst וְהַ֨שְּׁלִשִׁ֔ית <WH7992> of thee and a third part בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יִפְּל֣וּ <WH5307> shall fall סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH5439> round about וְהַשְּׁלִישִׁית֙ <WH7992> a third part לְכָל־ <WH3605> to every ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> into all the winds אֱזָרֶ֔ה <WH2219> thee and I will scatter וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> a sword אָרִ֥יק <WH7324> and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> after

וְכָלָ֣ה <WH3615> be accomplished אַפִּ֗י <WH639> Thus shall mine anger וַהֲנִחוֹתִ֧י <WH5117> to rest חֲמָתִ֛י <WH2534> and I will cause my fury בָּ֖ם וְהִנֶּחָ֑מְתִּי <WH5162> upon them and I will be comforted וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> that I the LORD דִּבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH1696> have spoken בְּקִנְאָתִ֔י <WH7068> [it] in my zeal בְּכַלּוֹתִ֥י <WH3615> when I have accomplished חֲמָתִ֖י <WH2534> my fury בָּֽם׃

וְאֶתְּנֵךְ֙ <WH5414> Moreover I will make לְחָרְבָּ֣ה <WH2723> thee waste וּלְחֶרְפָּ֔ה <WH2781> and a reproach בַּגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> among the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH5439> that [are] round about לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> thee in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> of all עוֹבֵֽר׃ <WH5674> of all that pass by

וְֽהָ֨יְתָ֜ה <WH1961> will be a חֶרְפָּ֤ה <WH2781> So it shall be a reproach וּגְדוּפָה֙ <WH1422> and a taunt מוּסָ֣ר <WH4148> an instruction וּמְשַׁמָּ֔ה <WH4923> and an astonishment לַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> unto the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH5439> that [are] round about בַּעֲשׂוֹתִי֩ <WH6213> thee when I shall execute בָ֨ךְ שְׁפָטִ֜ים <WH8201> judgments בְּאַ֤ף <WH639> in thee in anger וּבְחֵמָה֙ <WH2534> and in fury וּבְתֹכְח֣וֹת <WH8433> rebukes חֵמָ֔ה <WH2534> and in furious אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1696> have spoken

בְּֽשַׁלְּחִ֡י <WH7971> When I shall send אֶת־ <WH853> חִצֵּי֩ <WH2671> arrows הָרָעָ֨ב <WH7458> of famine הָרָעִ֤ים <WH7451> upon them the evil בָּהֶם֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become לְמַשְׁחִ֔ית <WH4889> which shall be for [their] destruction אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> [and] which I will send אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לְשַֽׁחֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH7843> to destroy וְרָעָב֙ <WH7458> the famine אֹסֵ֣ף <WH3254> you and I will increase עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> upon וְשָׁבַרְתִּ֥י <WH7665> upon you and will break לָכֶ֖ם מַטֵּה־ <WH4294> your staff לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> of bread

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֣י <WH7971> So will I send עֲ֠לֵיכֶם <WH5921> on רָעָ֞ב <WH7458> upon you famine וְחַיָּ֤ה <WH2416> beasts רָעָה֙ <WH7451> and evil וְשִׁכְּלֻ֔ךְ <WH7921> and they shall bereave וְדֶ֥בֶר <WH1698> thee and pestilence וָדָ֖ם <WH1818> and blood יַעֲבָר־ <WH5674> shall pass through בָּ֑ךְ וְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> the sword אָבִ֣יא <WH935> thee and I will bring עָלַ֔יִךְ <WH5921> and אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> upon thee I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1696> have spoken פ
